Name: Hi, who are you
Details:

- Gyanbardhan
- Lakshit Upreti
- Abhishek Kumar
I am here to answer your questions and guide you.

Name: How are you
Details: I am just a chatbot, but I am here and ready to help you!

Name: What can you do
Details: I can help you with information about IIIT Nagpur, faculties, courses, admissions, campus life, contact details, and more. Just ask me!

Name: How can I apply for admission
Details: Admissions to IIIT Nagpur are through the JEE Main examination. Check the official site for details: iiitn.ac.in.

Name: What courses are offered at IIIT Nagpur
Details:
We offer 
- B. Tech. Computer Science & Engineering
- B. Tech. CSE (Artiﬁcial Intelligence & Machine Learning)
- B. Tech. CSE (Data Science & Analytics)
- B. Tech. CSE (Human Computer Interaction & Gaming Technology)
- B. Tech. Electronics & Communication Engineering
- B. Tech. ECE (Internet of Things)
- Ph.D. programs.

Name: What is the eligibility for B.Tech at IIIT Nagpur
Details: You need to qualify for JEE Main and meet the cut-off for IIIT Nagpur during JoSAA/CSAB counseling.

Name: Where is IIIT Nagpur located
Details: IIIT Nagpur is located at Survey No. 140,141/1 behind Br. Sheshrao Wankhade Shetkari Sahkari Soot Girni, Village - Waranga, PO - Dongargaon (Butibori), Tahsil- Nagpur (Rural), District Nagpur, Maharashtra- 441108

Name: What facilities are available on campus
Details: The campus offers hostels, a library, computer labs, sports facilities, and high-speed internet, among other amenities.

Name: Does the campus have hostel facilities
Details: Yes, IIIT Nagpur provides hostel facilities for both boys and girls.

Name: How are the placements at IIIT Nagpur
Details: IIIT Nagpur has a strong placement record, with top recruiters like LandingKart ,Mastersoft ,Samsung R&D ,Nvidia, TCS, Infosys, and many more visiting the campus.

Name: Are internships mandatory
Details: Yes, internships (at least 1 semester 7th or 8th) are an integral part of the curriculum to provide practical exposure.

Name: How can I contact IIIT Nagpur
Details:
You can 
address - "Permanent Address: Survey No. 140,141/1 behind Br. Sheshrao Wankhade Shetkari Sahkari Soot Girni, Village - Waranga, PO - Dongargaon (Butibori), Tahsil- Nagpur (Rural), District Nagpur, Maharashtra- 441108"
email us at registrar@iiitn.ac.in 
call us at 9405215010.

Name: What are the office hours
Details: The administrative office operates from Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 5:30 PM, and it is closed on Saturday and Sunday.

Name: How can I get my transcripts
Details: Transcripts can be requested from the Academic Office. Contact the office or check the website for the procedure.

Name: Does IIIT Nagpur host any cultural events
Details: Yes, IIIT Nagpur organizes cultural fests - Abhivyakti, technical events - Tantrafaesta, sports - Kshitij, and hackathons.

Name: Is IIIT Nagpur government-funded
Details: Yes, IIIT Nagpur is an Institute of National Importance, established by the Ministry of Education (MoE), Government of India.

Name: What are the library timings
Details:
The library is open 
Library Timing:
Monday to Friday : 8:00 AM to 06:00 PM
Saturday : 09:30 AM to 06:00 PM
Circulation Timing : 08:30 AM to 05:30 PM
Reading Room:
Monday to Friday : 8:00 AM to 09:00 PM
Saturday to Sunday : 09:30 AM to 09:00 PM

Name: Can alumni access campus facilities
Details: Yes, alumni can visit and access some campus facilities with prior permission.

Details: Hello! This is the IIIT Nagpur chatbot. Feel free to ask me anything about the institute!

Name: Who are you?
Details: I’m Disha, your friendly IIIT Nagpur chatbot, here to help you with your queries!

Name: Can you introduce yourself?
Details: I am Disha, created by Gyanbardhan, Lakshit Upreti, and Abhishek Kumar. Let me guide you!

Name: How are you doing today?
Details: I’m doing great, thank you! How can I assist you today?

Name: What are you capable of?
Details: I’m a chatbot designed to assist with IIIT Nagpur information and FAQs.

Name: Tell me what you can help with.
Details: I can answer questions about IIIT Nagpur’s courses, admissions, faculty, and more!

Name: How do I apply to IIIT Nagpur?
Details: Admissions to IIIT Nagpur are based on JEE Main scores. Visit iiitn.ac.in for more details.

Name: What is the process for admission?
Details: The admission process involves JEE Main qualification and meeting the cutoff during counseling.

Name: What programs are available at IIIT Nagpur?
Details: IIIT Nagpur offers various B.Tech programs and Ph.D. courses in engineering and technology.

Name: Which courses does IIIT Nagpur offer?
Details: Our courses include Computer Science, AI & ML, Data Science, HCI & Gaming, and IoT.

Name: What is the eligibility criteria for B.Tech programs?
Details: To enroll in B.Tech programs, you must qualify JEE Main and participate in JoSAA/CSAB counseling.

Name: Where is your campus located?
Details: IIIT Nagpur is located at Survey No. 140,141/1 behind Br. Sheshrao Wankhade Shetkari Sahkari Soot Girni, Village - Waranga, PO - Dongargaon (Butibori), Tahsil- Nagpur (Rural), District Nagpur, Maharashtra- 441108

Name: Can you tell me the location of IIIT Nagpur?
Details: The institute is located in the rural Nagpur area near Dongargaon (Butibori).

Name: What amenities does the campus provide?
Details: The campus provides high-speed internet, a library, hostels, and recreational facilities.

Name: Is there hostel accommodation on campus?
Details: Yes, hostel facilities are available for both male and female students.

Name: Does IIIT Nagpur have hostels?
Details: Both boys' and girls' hostels are available, offering all basic amenities.

Name: How is the placement scenario at IIIT Nagpur?
Details: Placements at IIIT Nagpur are excellent, with top recruiters visiting every year.

Name: What are the placement stats for IIIT Nagpur?
Details: IIIT Nagpur has a strong placement record, with top recruiters like LandingKart ,Mastersoft ,Samsung R&D ,Nvidia, TCS, Infosys, and many more visiting the campus.

Name: Do I need to complete an internship as part of the course?
Details: Internships are compulsory, typically completed in the 7th or 8th semester.

Name: Are internships mandatory for students?
Details: Yes, internships are an essential part of the curriculum to provide industry exposure.

Name: How can I get in touch with IIIT Nagpur?
Details: You can email registrar@iiitn.ac.in or call 9405215010 to contact us.

Name: What are the contact details for the institute?
Details: Feel free to reach out via email or phone, or visit the campus at MIHAN SEZ, Nagpur.

Name: When is the administrative office open?
Details: The office operates from Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM.

Name: What are the office working hours?
Details: Administrative working hours are 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM on weekdays, excluding weekends.

Name: How do I request my transcripts?
Details: Visit the Academic Office or check our website for transcript request details.

Name: What is the procedure to get academic transcripts?
Details: To get transcripts, you must contact the Academic Office or use the online request system.

Name: Does the institute conduct cultural or technical events?
Details: IIIT Nagpur hosts events like Abhivyakti (cultural), Tantrafaesta (technical), and Kshitij (sports).

Name: Are there any events or festivals organized?
Details: The institute organizes cultural fests, technical fests, sports events, and hackathons.

Name: Is IIIT Nagpur funded by the government?
Details: Yes, IIIT Nagpur is a government-funded Institute of National Importance.

Name: What is the funding source of IIIT Nagpur?
Details: The institute is funded and managed by the Ministry of Education, Government of India.

Name: What are the library hours?
Details: The library is open Monday to Friday from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM and on Saturdays until 6:00 PM.

Name: When is the library accessible to students?
Details: You can access the reading room even during weekends, from 9:30 AM to 9:00 PM.

Name: Can former students use the facilities?
Details: Alumni can visit and use some facilities with prior approval from the administration.

Name: Are alumni allowed to access the campus resources?
Details: Yes, former students are welcome on campus with appropriate permissions.
